dcterms:description: A collection of about 30,000 PE ransomware binaries obtained from virusshare.com, collected over the period 2010 to 2017.
dcterms:title: PE ransomware binaries

dcterms:description: A collection of ransomware binaries obtained from VirusShare, used for training and testing the detection model.
dcterms:title: VirusShare ransomware binaries

dcterms:description: Negative examples collected from the Windows Application Store, used to balance the dataset for ransomware detection.
dcterms:title: Windows Application Store negative examples

dcterms:description: An experimental dataset consisting of 3000 normal (benign) and 3000 ransomware samples, used for training and testing the CNN model.
dcterms:title: Experimental Dataset (Normal and Ransomware)
